plot: Brooke tells Thorne about Caroline's ultimatum. She cannot believe that he wants to stay out of this drama and considers it a mere conflict between her and his wife. At Café Russe, Ridge manages to lift Stephanie's spirits. When they spot Kristen and Clarke also having dinner there, Ridge is less than gracious to his sister's boyfriend. Brooke returns home and explains to Storm that it is over between her and Ridge. Later, Ridge asks Brooke out, but she tearfully turns him down. Thorne presses Caroline to move.—Torsten B. Tomaschek
